name: Mass Effect 2: Lair of the Shadow Broker
name_original: Mass Effect 2: Lair of the Shadow Broker
description: Liara T'Soni is tracking down the mysterious Shadow Broker, and no one is safe. She'll do anything to recover the man the Broker kidnapped... and the Shadow Broker's agents will do anything to stop her. Team up with Liara and chase clues from the luxurious heights of Illium to the Shadow Broker's own secret lair.
